channel.title: court approval on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in court approval on FinanClub

item.title: APE
item.description: score:50 Chances: AMC’s stock conversion is over, and analysts predict potential for more dilution. AMC’s stock conversion receives approval, allowing the company to sell nearly 400 million new shares. AMC CEO explains stock divide following court ruling. AMC Entertainment’s revised stock conversion plan gets approved by a judge.
